content: {"locationId": "8518", "organizationId": "7028", "name": "Russian River Food Pantry Salvation Army", "address1": "16290 5th St", "address2": "", "city": "Guerneville", "state": "CA", "zipCode": "95446", "country": null, "phone": "", "phoneExt": "", "website": "", "latitude": "38.5034167", "longitude": "-122.9982252", "foodPrograms": "Food Distribution", "serviceAreas": "", "languages": "", "features": "Parking Available", "aboutUs": "Grocery shopping inside St. Hubert's Hall, behind the Guerneville Fire Station. Dog and cat food is provided by the Humane Society on the 4th Saturday, usually outdoors in the parking area.", "notes": "Please bring your own shopping bags and/or boxes whenever possible.", "contactName": "Dani ", "contactPhone": "707-481-4604", "contactEmail": "", "servicePrograms": "", "foodServiceTypes": "Walking Through", "dietRestrictions": "", "foodOfferings": "", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 59, "regionName": "Redwood Empire Food Bank", "logoBlobNameSmall": "1f934c90-6fab-4f51-9c97-aef07a96094a.png", "website": "https://refb.org/"}], "timeZoneName": "Pacific Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "PT", "offsetHours": "-7", "schedules": ["Saturday 9:00 AM-12:00 PM", "Saturday 9:00 AM-12:00 PM"], "services": [], "specialHours": []}
